> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight unwilling followed them, she tried to memorize all the
> sorroundings hoping to be able to find her way if she had a chance

<NEW>

SABERBACK was ignoring NIGHTLIGHT for the moment as the SHARKTICON
guards had her firmly in their grasp. They had pushed her up to a lift
and were about to enter it when SABERBACK got a call on his radio.

"What is it?" He said imperiously.

He paused while someone on the other end spoke to him.

"What?" he said incredulously. "How?" He said into his radio.

Finally he nodded and looked at NIGHTLIGHT, "I had so many sweet plans
for you." He said as he ran a clawed finger on her chin plate. His
frown deepened. "But there has been a slight . . . delay in them.

SABERBACK's frown became a twisted and wicked smile, "We will let you
watch as we put a few Maximals to death first, and then I can get back
to my plans for you."

Glancing at the SHARKTICONS he turned to walk back down the hall away
from the lift. "Bring her!" SABERBACK barked as he walked.

The SHARKTICONS began to force NIGHTLIGHT down the hall away from the
lift. This time the pace was much faster.

(TAG)

- Preston
